column1: # United States annual mortality rates from all causes and from infectious diseases 1900-1996
# The units are deaths per 100000 per year
# This data file is available online from the International Infectious Disease Data Archive (IIDDA) at http://iidda.mcmaster.ca
# Please acknowledge IIDDA in any publication or presentation in which data downloaded from IIDDA are used.
# First publication to use this data: D. J. D. Earn; J. Dushoff and S. A. Levin (2002) 'Ecology and evolution of the flu' Trends in Ecology and Evolution 17(7): 334-340
# See the IIDDA website for a list of all papers that have used this data file.
# acm = all cause mortality; non.idm = mortality from causes other than infectious disease; idm = infectious disease mortality
